system.Text:
When __you encounter a helpful situation or feature within a site__, roll on the following table. If you are making this move as a result of a strong hit on @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironsworndelvemoves.36c6cbe556fbb639]{Delve the Depths}, you may pick or envision an opportunity instead of rolling.

Then, choose one.

  * Gain insight or prepare: Take +1 momentum.
  * Take action now: You and any allies may make a move (not a progress move) which directly leverages the opportunity. When you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Trigger.Text: When you encounter a helpful situation or feature within a site...
